# DNS Tool - Authoritative DNS & Email Security Intelligence
> A comprehensive DNS intelligence tool for IT professionals

DNS Tool provides real-time DNS record analysis, email security validation (SPF, DKIM, DMARC), DNSSEC verification, BIMI checking, and domain intelligence via RDAP.

## Features
- Authoritative DNS record lookups (A, AAAA, MX, TXT, NS, SOA, CAA, SRV)
- Email security analysis (SPF, DKIM, DMARC with full policy parsing)
- MTA-STS and TLS-RPT verification (RFC 8461, RFC 8460)
- DNSSEC chain validation with AD flag verification
- BIMI record and logo verification
- SMTP transport security (STARTTLS, TLS version, cipher strength)
- CAA record analysis (Certificate Authority Authorization)
- Domain registrar information via RDAP
- Security posture scoring with executive-level verdicts

## Usage
Enter any domain name to receive a complete one-page audit of DNS configuration and email security posture.
